message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.IR, cs.AI 

The paper deals with computer vision and machine learning techniques to predict the best camera view for soccer broadcasting. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also introduces a random survival forest method, which falls under the category of machine learning, making cs.LG (Machine Learning) another likely category. The proposed spatial-appearance heatmap can be considered as a multimedia analysis technique, which falls under the category of cs.MM (Multimedia). The paper also deals with imputing incomplete data, which can be considered as a data analysis technique, making cs.IR (Information Retrieval) another possible category. Finally, the paper proposes a novel approach to solve the camera selection problem, which can be considered as an artificial intelligence technique, making cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) another possible category.
